name: Omnium Shield
description: Generate an Omnium shield that stops projectiles for **10** seconds, with starting energy equal to **200%** of the Wanderer's max HP and a **90**-second cooldown.
advancements: Slow enemies that pass through the shield by **50%** for **2** seconds.
Reduces frost damage received by **2%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
When wanderers or allies pass through the Omnium Shield, damage dealt increases by **25%** for **7** seconds.
